alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 8:07PM MST until November 17 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. North to northwest wind gusting 30 to 45 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Johnson County. * WHEN...Now until 9 AM Thursday. The heaviest snow is likely to fall between now and 2 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times tonight into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Interstates 90 and 25 across northern Johnson County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
